name: Noise gate
description: A multi-channel noise gate with optional sidechain input. Each channel operates independently.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Enables the channel. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Left/mono input
parameters.description: The left or mono input bus. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Right input
parameters.description: The right input bus, if stereo (0=None). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Sidechain input
parameters.description: The sidechain input bus (0=None). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: The threshold level required to open the gate. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Hysteresis
parameters.description: The level, relative to the threshold, that the input must drop below before the gate closes again. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Attack
parameters.description: The attack time for the gate opening (0.2ms to 200ms, exponential scale). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Hold
parameters.description: The minimum time that the gate remains open (1ms to 1000ms, exponential scale). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Release
parameters.description: The release time for the gate closing (2ms to 2000ms, exponential scale). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Lookahead
parameters.description: Lookahead time to prevent missing sharp transients (adds latency). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Gain reduction
parameters.description: Amount signal is attenuated when gate is closed (-80 treated as -âˆždB). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: 1 28 1 The left or mono input bus. Right input
parameters.description: The right input bus, if stereo.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 The sidechain input bus. Threshold
parameters.description: The threshold level required to open the gate.

parameters.name: 1 28 1 The left or mono input bus. Right input
parameters.description: The right input bus, if stereo.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 The sidechain input bus. Threshold
parameters.description: The threshold level required to open the gate.

input_ports.name: Input L/Mono
input_ports.description: Left or Mono audio input. Use busIdRef based on channel index.

input_ports.name: Input R
input_ports.description: Right audio input (if stereo). Use busIdRef based on channel index.

input_ports.name: Sidechain In
input_ports.description: Sidechain control input. Use busIdRef based on channel index.

output_ports.name: Output L/Mono
output_ports.description: Gated Left or Mono audio output (replaces input). Use busIdRef based on channel index.

output_ports.name: Output R
output_ports.description: Gated Right audio output (if stereo, replaces input). Use busIdRef based on channel index.
